lines.text: Julio , go on inside. And check who is inside.
Alright, Walt. There is nobody in there but the bartender. He peed on himself in the back.
Come on over here you. What's your name?

[nervously answers]
Tom.
Do you know who I am , Tom?
Yes sir, Mr. Shannon.
Well, these are a couple of "friends" of mine, Tom. This here is Boise. He's a back-shooter and a whiner but he will kill you dead.
Yeah! I could do that!
And this here now, that Julio. Julio like to sing but you probably don't want to hear him sing now do you, Tom?
No, no, no sir. I don't need to hear him sing. That's fine.
You got a Marshall or a Sheriff around here, Tom?
That be Jordan Yarnell. He's only temporary.

You probably right about that, Tom. Now I want you to find me this, temporary sheriff. You tell him. That Walt Shannon is over here waiting for him. I also want you to tell him , he's got kin of mine in that jail of his! And that I want to inquire as to "visitation" rights.

[spits out his drink because he's laughing]
Gee, that's funny, Walt!
No, it ain't!
You're right. It ain't funny at t'all.
How many you say?
Three Senor.

[barely walking because of the pain from his previous gun wound]
Alright. Damn...
Are you gonna make it?
When they come out in the street, they will try to be as far apart as they can. I'll take Shannon and one close by. And you take the closes one to you.
Closes... one?

If Shannon is the closes one , I will take him. And the one next to him. Listen, don't hesitate. For Christ sakes. When I drop this rifle, you cut the bastard in half. Don't let me be out there, pissing in the wind! You think you can manage that old man?
I... hope... so...
Well, you better do a lot more than hope so... or we are gonna be dead as door-nails, in a couple of minutes.
No matter what happens, I love you.
Jordan, please...
You can't come this time , son.
What are you talking about?
You need to stay here and look out for everybody.
Jordan! Please! I have to tell you something! I have been lying to you about something!
It doesn't make any difference! Nothing makes any difference anymore!

[suddenly Morgan breaks the door in and hits Jordan with the butt of his rifle and knocks him out]
Grrrr!

[Morgan grabs Spud and smashes him against a cabinet and renders Spud helpless]
You want to kill me? you want to spit in my face?

[Kristen tries to stop Morgan but Morgan pushes her off]
Stop it! No!

This little girl loves you! If you feel the same about her, you marry her! But if you ever put a gun in your hand again, I'll hear about it! And so help me God, I will find you, and I will kill you dead! Do you understand me?
I hate you. I hope you die.

[Morgan walks over to the door with Linda and observe Jordan on the floor]
He's not going to die. He's gonna wake up with a hell of a headache. But he will be all in one piece, just like you wanted.
What about you?
What about me...?
[leaves]
I'm sorry! The shotgun just went off by itself!

[moans because of the 2 gun wounds he now has]
Get my horse!

[Acosta brings Morgan his horse]
Goodbye Linda...

[feeling guilty of all that has happened]
Kristen, I have to tell you something about your real father.
No, no it's better your way Linda...
No it's not! What? What about my real father?

[looks at Linda who in turn looks at Morgan]
Why did you kill Shannon? Why did you do that?
I don't know... sometimes I do things I can't explain. I'm a lot like you!

[Morgan gets on his horse and leaves]
Mom?, mom? He called you Linda.
Yes he did...

[Kristen starts crying]
But how did he know your name?
I use to know him... a long time ago.

[continues crying]
Is he... is he my...

[Linda nods yes]
Oh God!...

[Kristen runs after Morgan but he is to far already gone on his way with his dog right beside him]
I'm sorry... I didn't mean it...
[continues crying and then smiles]
Whiskey.
[as the catina bartender ignores his request, Bret quickly takes out his gun and points it at the bartender]
I said whiskey pig!
You better get my brother a drink friend or he will put a bullet in you.
[the bartender serves him a drink]
My name is Jesse Landon. This is my brother Bret. Have you heard of him?
I don't think so Senor.
My brother and I looking for somebody. Can you tell us if that man is here.
The name Senor?
Frank Morgan.
I don't know anyone by that name.
You lying amigo. Everyone knows Frank Morgan.
[the dog gets up and leaves]
Why is it so damn quite in here? Play some music! Where do you think you going 'chiquita'? Stay up there and dance! Are you so damn stupid you don't understand English? I said dance dammit!
Leave her alone.
[slowly gets up and stares without blinking]
Morgan? is that you?
So, you're Frank Morgan? My name is Jesse Landon. This here is my brother Bret.
I know who you are. What do you have in mind?
People say you fast, but you wanna hear something funny? I think my brother here is a little faster.
We don't have to do this . Let me buy you a drink.
I'll drink later.
No you won't. You'll be dead. Both of you. When he pulls that gun, you both will be Dead!
He will be the one dead lady.
I saw you strap your gun on that bartender. You really fast kid. But you ain't gonna make it. Don't do this to yourself. Please.

Don't listen to him little brother. He trying to rattle you. You can do it! You younger and you faster. Look He's an old man for Christ's sake. Look at him he's yellow. He's scared of you. He's got piss swelling in his eyes. Listen, what did we ride out here from Kansas anyhow? So you, can have your name written in the wind forever, right? So what's it gonna be? You or him? Come on do it. Do it! Do it boy! Now!

[Bret pulls out his gun but Morgan is way faster and shoots Bret dead]
He was just a... kid.
[turns to Jesse and cocks his gun again]
I have seen sons of bitches like you all my life.
No, no, Morgan, wait, wait! I ain't no gunfighter! My brother, he was the gunfighter. He was not even my real brother. He's my half-brother.
I'll give you an edge. Look what you done! Take it out... Do it! slowly... Now cock it... there's your edge...

[Jesse goes to shoot but is way to slow and Morgan shoots him but not killing him]
Now get up damn you! Get Up! Get up and dance! Are you to stupid to understand English? Get up!
Please Frank! Don't kill him! Stop! I'm begging you! For me, Rosa! No lo mates! No vale la pena! For me Frank , for me!
Hey storekeeper!
I hear ya!
I'm hungry!
You'll get fed.
Like the rest of the hogs.
You really think you fast huh kid? Hell I know guys who would blow you away before you could spit!
You know what you remind me of Morris?
Leave it be Spud.
A turd with lips.

[looking at Kristen]
Come over here hunny, I can show you where you could put your neckline.
You watch your mouth around her saddle tramp!
Yes sir Mr. Storekeeper. You got me so scared I've got the diarrhea.

[just then Old Harry rushes in and Spud takes out and points his gun at Old Harry]
Jesus, Spud!
Shoot him kid! Shoot the old fart!
Jesus Christ Harry, you know better than to come barging in here like that! What do you want anyway?
Huh? Oh yeah! You not going to believe it Jordan! You are not going to believe it!
What ain't I not going to believe?
Frank Morgan just rode into town!
Damn.
Who's Frank Morgan? Jordan? Who's Frank Morgan?
He's some kind of gunfighter.
Oh no! He ain't! Calling Frank Morgan just a gunfighter is like calling the desert dry! He is more than some kind of gunfighter Jordan. He's a honest to God, walking around legend!
Do you think he come to spring Morris?
Naw, he ain't come 2 spring Morris. He come to convert everybody to the baby Jesus.
Good afternoon. Mind if I sit down?

[looks at the dog]
Move!
You Frank Morgan?
Who are you?
Jordan Yarnell, temporary sheriff. This is my deputy Spud Walker.
Where's the real one?
Real what?
Sheriff.
He got shot.

[Spud moves closer to Morgan and Morgan keeps his eye on him]
You packing a lot of iron there kid.
I can use it too.
You can huh?
What do you want here, Morgan?
I want more... coffee.
[Tom the bartender rushes to serve him]
We got a prisoner over in the jail, Jack Morris.
We gonna hang him next week.
That's nice.
Maybe you didn't hear him right. We gonna Hang Morris next week!
Listen Mr. Temporary Sheriff, I don't care if you hang Ulysses S. Grant! It ain't got nothing to do with me because I'm just passing thru.

[Just then Juan Acosta accidently knocks over some glasses and breaks them which makes Spud jump and goes for his gun and cocks it]
Your deputy has hooked himself on a short fuse there Mr. Temporary sheriff.
You just remember what I said. We gonna hang him.
Ain't nobody gonna stop us neither.
How long you planning on staying in Red Pine, Morgan?

[stares at Spud]
As long as I want. And nobody can stop me, neither.

[Acosta is on his knees cleaning the broken glass he broke]
Hey, get up!

[scared]
You talking to me?
Yes, I'm talking to you. Come here. Sit down. Por favor.
[Morgan pulls out a tobacco cigar and takes out a knife]
Tobacco?
[Acosta nods yes and Morgan cuts it in two and stabs the knife on the table]
A man should not be on his knees, it's a bad place to be. A man on his knees, is half a man.
[lights the cigars]

[lights the cigars]
Do you know where I could stay and get some decent food that doesn't taste like a gringo cow pissed on it?
There's a house, but it may not be for a man, with such "exceptional" taste as yourself.

[looks at Tom the bartender]
What are you looking at? You better clean up that mess or someone could slip and break their fool neck. Did you hear what I said you jackass? Pick up that broom and clean it up!
My woman is a pretty good cook. We don't have much, but you are welcomed in my house.
Gracias Senor.

[both looking at Tom]
You right amigo. It's not a good place to be... On the knees.
[both laugh]
Shannon!

[Julio cocks his rifle]
Stop!
What's the matter?
I know that voice.
Well, who is it?
Hey Walt! Get your ass out here!
Morgan.
Frank Morgan? Jesus, Walt! You never said...
Shut up!... I wonder what he's doing here?
What are you doing in there Shannon, playing with yourself?

[approaches the bar doors very cautiously and slowly and appears vampire-like as he opens the doors]
What do you say Frank? Been a long time.

[Shannon comes out with his hands up and Boise & Julio come out behind him and spread out to encircle Morgan]
What are you doing here Frank?
Standing in for Yarnell.
Standing in huh?... You all by yourself Frank?... You don't look to good... Someone get mad at you Frank?
Come on Walt, let's get this over with.
This here is... Frank Morgan fellas.

[Kristen, Linda and Spud arrive in the background]
Mom, why is he...
Be still, Kristen. Be still and watch.
Frank will be standing in for Yarnell... But he's having a little trouble... just standing... Ain't that right , Frank?
Why don't I get rid of this...
Why don't you do... just that...

[drops the rifle so Acosta can start shooting but Morgan realizes that Acosta didn't see him do it and he's on his own against all 3 villains]
Hmmm...

[stares at Shannon who stares at Boise who then stares at Morgan, who in turn looks at Julio who in turn looks at Shannon who in turn looks at Morgan and it's the moment of truth in which there is no turning back]
Sighs...

[Shannon draws but Morgan is quicker and shoots him and Julio but Shannon manages to shoot Frank and Morgan shoots him again while Acosta finally shoots in the air no less and Boise was just about to shoot Frank but his gun breaks]
Bullshit! The gun broke open! There's no bullets! There's no bullets, no gun! I didn't mean it! It was a mistake! Don't shoot! I quit!

[Morgan fires 2 shots and kills Boise who crashes through a store window]
Sweet Jesus!
